channel.title: [help!]
channel.description:
Hello,
I just need some help please can someone tell me how do i add more player right I want to add a supporter right to my server.
And plus something wrong with my SEVER it don't run more then 1-2days then it disconnect sometime it disconnect random time anyone know whats the problem i will be happy if someone answer my question because i never get a answer

item.title: [help!]
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

I_Power_I:

No idea but Matiasmunk is completely wrong as 4 is a hidden administrator…

I never thought I should correct you Power*… But rights 4 is not Hidden Administrator anymore…
On most servers rights 4 have become Donator now.

Read full topic

item.title: [help!]
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:
@PriMaL_PvP wrote:

You Can Also Add a New Token

Step 1. Go Into Player.java Search

public int playerRights;

And under that Add this

public int supportStatus;
You cna Change it

Then Go into PlayerAssistant.Java And Add the Token
Search For

isDonator
If You Can Find It Try Donator or Something to Do with donating
You Shud see Something Like This
} else if (token.equals("isDonator")) { p.isDonator = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under That Add this
} else if (token.equals(“supportStatus”)) {
p.supportStatus = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Then Search For isdonator Again

And under characterfile.newLine();

Add this

characterfile.write("supportStatus = ", 0, 12);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.supportStatus), 0, Integer.toString(p.supportStatus).length());
characterfile.newLine();

The Rest is Simple After A Command instead of Playerrights 3 add supportStatus 1

Hope This Works

Read full topic

item.title: [help!]
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

The random shut downs can be memory leaks…

The playerrights depends on which base you’re using
For [PI] Project Insanity you go in the Data folder then in the Characters and then you find the character you wanna make supporter. Then where you see Player Rights, change it to 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4.

0 is player
1 is moderator
2 is admin
3 is owner
4 is donator

Read full topic
